title: Delicate Arch
description: A striking natural sandstone arch nestled in the red-rock desert, offering scenic views, short hikes, and great photo opportunities for visitors exploring southern Utah's unique landscapes.
address: 123 Desert Arch Rd, Cedar City, Ut 84721

title: Brian Head Resort
description: A year-round mountain resort known for skiing, snowboarding, moutain biking, and high-elevation scenic views among the alpine forests.
address: 3290 Snow Ridge Way, Brian Head, Ut 84719

title: Snowy Cedar Overlook
description: A peaceful winter viewpoint overlooking Utah's snow-covered landscapes, perfect for photos, quiet walks, and scenic relaxation.
address: 980 Winter Ridge Trail, Cedar City, Ut 84721

title: Art Photo Studio
description: A creative local photography space featuring portrait sessions, exhibits, and artistic showcasses from Cedar City Photographers.

title: The Utah Midsummer Renaissance Faire
description: A lively annual festival celebrating medieval culture with artisan vendors, free live entertainment, costumes, food booths, and family activities.
address: 200 N Main St., Cedar City, Ut 84721

title: Frontier Homestead Museum
description: A museum showcasing Pioneer life with historic buildings, artifacts, hands-on exhibits, and stories of early Iron County settlers.
address: 750 Pioneer Heritage Road, Cedar City, Ut 84720

title: Historic Downtown Cedar City
description: A charming district filled with local shops, cafes, murals, and restored historic buildings that reflect Cedar City's small-town heritage.
address: 145 W Main Street, Cedar City, UT 84720

title: Cedar Breaks
description: A stunning natural amphitheater carved from colorful cliffs, offering hiking trails, scenic overlooks, and breathtaking high-elevation views.
address: 1000 Rimview Overlook Road, Brian Head, UT 84719
